entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
